trends: There has been one other sighting in Troy and Hawkpoint
There was one other sighting in Troy and Hawkpoint on or around October 15th 2003
Summary: multi colored lights in one position for over 30 m
divs: Sighting Detailsstanding out side at or about 8pm looking west north west at what I thought wasa pulsating star, emitting red ,white,and green lights.The object was stationaryfor about 25 minutes, I saw a comercial air liner traveling twards the object,when the jet airliner was with in about 7 miles of the object. Ir the objectturned off its lights and when it illumenated it self again, it appeared lowerin the westen sky, repeating this same action until it disapeared below thewestern horizon.The jet liner stayed a stedy course west noth west never veringoff course.
